explains: adv. 明显地；显然；看得见地

sentences.en: When he went into retirement, he visibly withered.
sentences.cn: 到了退休年龄时，他明显变得虚弱了。

sentences.en: As they approached the outskirts of the city, Ella's mood visibly lightened.
sentences.cn: 随着他们越来越接近市郊，埃拉的心情明显变得轻松了。

sentences.en: She paled visibly at the news.
sentences.cn: 她听到这消息时脸色明显地变得苍白。
